document_data.name: Living Unseen Servant
document_data.mainbody: A '''living unseen servant''' was an ''[[unseen servant]]'' that had been [[conjuration|conjured]] as a [[living spell]] in an area effected by [[wild magic]]. They served their master unerringly, as a sort of over-eager manservant or chambermaid.
document_data.Description:
While they were typically ''[[Invisibility|invisible]]'' in appearance, as per their name, the use of certain [[divination]] [[spell]]s such as ''[[see invisibility]]'' or ''[[true seeing]]'' showed they had the form of a slender, adult [[humanoid]].

As they were considered magical constructs, living servants were immune to [[poison]], [[paralyze|paralyzation]], and petrification, and could not be rendered unconscious.
